label: SpecifiedParameter
comment: A specified feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
A type, expressed as text, for this observation objective parameter.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.
A value, expressed as text, for this document characteristic.
The indication of whether or not the value for this specified parameter is allowed.

objectProperties.comment: A measure of a value of the status for this specified parameter.
A measure of a value for this document characteristic.
A tolerance specified for a value of this metric characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: A parameter specified for a value for this metric characteristic.
A parameter applicable to this specified method.
